sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_34878d54777131101a80bebc9f5a9961
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>system.upgraded</event_name><name>Migrate clear value actions</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var scriptPrefix = "fix_migrate_clear_value_actions";

gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Started executing the script");
moveClearValueData();
gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Ended executing the script");

function moveClearValueData() {
    var clearValueTypes = ['25', '33'];
    var variableIds = [];
    var clearValueVariableIds = [];
    var gr1 = new GlideRecord("catalog_ui_policy_action");
    gr1.setWorkflow(false);
    gr1.get("cleared", true);
    while (gr1.next())
        variableIds.push(gr1.getValue("catalog_variable").substring(3));

    var variable = new GlideRecord("item_option_new");
    variable.addQuery("sys_id", variableIds);
    variable.addQuery("type", clearValueTypes);
    variable.setWorkflow(false);
    variable.query();
    while (variable.next())
        clearValueVariableIds.push("IO:" + variable.getUniqueValue());

    var gr = new GlideRecord("catalog_ui_policy_action");
    gr.addQuery("cleared", true);
    gr.addQuery("catalog_variable", "NOT IN", clearValueVariableIds);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.setValue("value_action", "clear_value");
    gr.setValue("cleared", "");
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.updateMultiple();
}

//Deactivate the script action after first run
var action = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
if (action.get("34878d54777131101a80bebc9f5a9961")) {
	action.setValue("active", false);
	action.update();
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>event.parm1 == 'sn_scmobile'</condition_script><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Service catalog mobile upgrade</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var upgradeTool = new sn_scmobile.CatalogMobileUpgradeTools();
upgradeTool.cleanUpgradeCardViews();
upgradeTool.cleanUpgradeInputFormScreen();

//De activate the script once it is completed the execution

var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9");
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
    gr.setValue("active", false);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-04 08:39:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Service catalog mobile upgrade</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Catalog for mobile" source="sn_scmobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Service Catalog for mobile">2263a68187032300e0ef0cf888cb0b3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_a58e03ca771a111059018f1a5b5a99f9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 19:55:01</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_producer_48bcec40eb0311003623666cd206fe24
sys_update_xml.payload:
truefalseon_desktopfalsefalsee15706fc0a0a0aa7007fc21e1ab70c2f0523da512c611228900811a37c97c20141970-01-03 00:00:00Item Designer category requests allow you to request a new category within the catalog. Once created, you will be able to create and publish items that allow users to request products and services.

For each item, you will be able to define:

  • the questions the user must complete to submit the request
  • approvals that must be completed for the request to progress to fulfillment
  • at least 1 task that will be used to fulfill the request

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the item designer category. You can also assign editors who will also have permission to create/update items within this category.

Once this request is fulfilled and the category is created, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your items.

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>login.failed</event_name><name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[//
// Check to see if the user has failed to login too many times
// when the limit is reached, lock the user out of the system.
// Also create a trigger to unlock the user after 'N' minutes.
//

lockoutOnFailedLogin();

function lockoutOnFailedLogin() {
	var maxUnlockAttempts = gs.getProperty("glide.user.max_unlock_attempts", 5);
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
	if (gr.get("user_name", event.parm1.toString())) {
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts)
			return;

		gr.failed_attempts += 1;
		if (gr.failed_attempts > maxUnlockAttempts) {
			gr.locked_out = true;
			gr.update();
			gs.log("User " + event.parm1 + " locked out due to too many invalid login attempts");
			triggerUnlock(gr.sys_id);
		} else {
			gr.update();       
		}
	}
}

function triggerUnlock(userSysID) {
	var unlockIn = gs.getProperty("glide.user.unlock_timeout_in_mins", 15);
	var trigger = new GlideRecord("sys_trigger");
	trigger.name = "Unlock the user after "+ unlockIn + " mins";
	trigger.next_action = getTriggerTime(unlockIn);
	trigger.job_id.setDisplayValue('RunScriptJob');
	trigger.script = getTriggerScript(userSysID);
	trigger.document = 'sys_user';
	trigger.document_key = userSysID;
	trigger.state = 0;
	trigger.trigger_type = 0;
	trigger.insert();
}

function getTriggerScript(userSysID) {
	var ret = ""
	+ "var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('sys_id', '" +userSysID+ "');\n"
	+ "gr.addQuery('locked_out', true);\n"
	+ "gr.query();\n"
	+ "if (gr.next()) {\n"
		+ "gr.locked_out = false;\n"
		+ "gr.failed_attempts = 0;\n"
		+ "gr.update();\n"
		+ "gs.log('Auto-unlocking user '+gr.name);\n"
	+ "} else {\n"
		+ "gs.log('Unable to auto-unlock user with sys_id: "+userSysID+"');\n"
	+ "}";
	return ret;
}

function getTriggerTime(minutesToAdd) {
	var checkTime = new GlideDateTime(/*now*/);
	checkTime.addSeconds(minutesToAdd * 60);
	return checkTime;
}
]]></script><synchronous>true</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-08-24 00:27:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNC User Lockout Check with Auto Unlock</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">0230f1de8db0021087de63ac7f1f000d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_d92636b2975301008e00958e3b297567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>developer.program.hop@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-14 01:33:05</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

if (pm.isActive('com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid.state_model')) {
	if (new ProblemStateUtils().isClosed(current))
		answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-15 13:27:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>1221ba62c3223010a282a539e540dd7e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>problem.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Roles - Problem Management (do not activate, see plugin description)" source="com.snc.itsm.roles.problem_management">fb637d568d34021087de63ac7f1f00a5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_1221ba62c3223010a282a539e540dd7e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 19:54:43</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_466e93efc3023010da62cde97640dd78
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Default access control on sys_flow_group_approval_listener_reference</description><local_or_existing/><name>sys_flow_group_approval_listener_reference</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = gs.getSession().isLoggedIn();

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>dev.api_click</event_name><name>Track Clicks on PDI homepage</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var propName = event.parm1;
	var clickCount = parseInt(gs.getProperty(propName));
	
	var updateCount = clickCount + 1;
	
	gs.setProperty(propName, updateCount);
}());]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>developer.program.hop@snc</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-15 11:13:46</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9eb526c283210210ae8dc4a6feaad3cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Track Clicks on PDI homepage</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_9eb526c283210210ae8dc4a6feaad3cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>developer.program.hop@snc</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-15 11:13:46</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_78351e1b0a0a0bbe0028ec8853be3731
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>discovery_credentials</collection><condition>current.ssh_private_key.changes() && !current.ssh_private_key.nil()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Encrypt ssh private key</name><order>100</order><priority/><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[/*
* Some practical considerations.
* 1. The database should never store unecrypted private key. By doing setAbortAtion, the UI will maintain 
*    the invalid value, but not in the database.
* 2. We should always have the right message telling the user why the private key is incorrect
*/

(function() {
	var curKey = current.ssh_private_key;
	
	if (! SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.keyIsInCorrectFormat(curKey)) {
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("The SSH private key must start with '-----BEGIN'."));		
		return;
	}
	
	current.ssh_private_key = SSHPrivateKeyCredentialUtils.encryptUsingKMFCryptoOperation(curKey);
	
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2008-11-07 18:27:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>78351e1b0a0a0bbe0028ec8853be3731</sys_id><sys_mod_count>78</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Encrypt ssh private key</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Core Automation" source="com.snc.core.automation">317071528df0021087de63ac7f1f0027</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_78351e1b0a0a0bbe0028ec8853be3731</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-14 03:02:01</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=78351e1b0a0a0bbe0028ec8853be3731"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for all fields in problem, for users with role itil, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing/><name>problem.*</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;
if (pm.isActive('com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid.state_model')) {
	if (new ProblemStateUtils().isClosed(current))
		answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-07-26 17:06:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>080a301ac3e13010a282a539e540dd1d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>problem.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITSM Roles - Problem Management (do not activate, see plugin description)" source="com.snc.itsm.roles.problem_management">fb637d568d34021087de63ac7f1f00a5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_080a301ac3e13010a282a539e540dd1d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 19:54:43</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_2272b72477113110121e8f1a5b5a99b1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script>event.parm1 == 'sn_scmobile'</condition_script><description/><event_name>plugin.upgraded</event_name><name>Activate catalog mobile draft item card</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[
    //Refer fix_activate_draft_item_card.xml while making changes
var scriptPrefix = "fix_activate_draft_item_card: Script_action: ";
gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Started executing the script");
activateDraftItemCard();
gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Ended executing the script");

function activateDraftItemCard() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_view_config");
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    if (gr.get("89998916c3a03110547aab8f8740dd34")) {
        //If it is already active by fix script we don't need to update.
        if (gr.getValue("active") == 1) {
            gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Draft item card is already active");
            return;
        }

        var gcd = GlideCollisionDetector.get();
        if (gs.nil(gcd)) {
            gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Error in initiating GlideCollisionDetector.");
            return;
        }
        //If card is customised by customer we don't update it.
        if (gcd.containsKey(gr.getValue("sys_update_name"))) {
            gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Draft item card is customised.");
            return;
        }


        gr.setValue("active", true);
        if (gr.update())
            gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Draft item card having sys_id {0} successfully activated.", gr.getUniqueValue());
        else
            gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Not able to Activate the Draft item card having sys_id {0}", gr.getUniqueValue());
    } else {
        gs.info(scriptPrefix + "Draft item card not found.");
    }
}

//De activate the script once it is completed the execution
var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
if (gr.get("2272b72477113110121e8f1a5b5a99b1")) {
    gr.setValue("active", false);
    gr.update();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-12 18:40:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2272b72477113110121e8f1a5b5a99b1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Activate catalog mobile draft item card</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">50ff215e8db0021087de63ac7f1f0047</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_2272b72477113110121e8f1a5b5a99b1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 19:55:01</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Activate catalog mobile draft item card

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>system.upgraded</event_name><name>OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedbackUpdates</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Starting update of the OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedback table to populate the NLU Discovery Outcome field");
try {
	var api = new UpdateNLUDiscoveryOutcomes();
	api.updateNluDiscoveryOutcomes();
} catch (ex) {
	gs.info("Error running updateNluDiscoveryOutcomes() : " + ex.toString());
}

// Set this record to false so that it does not run again
var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent_script_action");
gr.addQuery("sys_id", "d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f"); // Sysid of this record
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue("active", false);
	gr.update();
}

gs.info("Completed update of the OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedback table");

]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-08-19 16:46:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OpenNLUPredictIntentFeedbackUpdates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">0177b1da8d74021087de63ac7f1f006a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_d28b5c06eb463010506f7558b552281f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 20:20:23</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_533f944583710210ae8dc4a6feaad375
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.getMetricInstances</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getMetricInstances</name><script><![CDATA[var getMetricInstances = Class.create();
getMetricInstances.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
    getMetricInstance: function () {
        var str = [];
        var gr = new GlideAggregate('metric_instance');
        gr.addEncodedQuery('definition=3ebb980183710210ae8dc4a6feaad33a'); //if this condition is not added, it would query all metric instances and since metric_instance table is huge query will take time to execute.
        gr.addAggregate('COUNT', 'id');
        gr.groupBy('id');
        gr.addHaving('COUNT', '>', 1);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            str.push(gr.getValue('id') + '');
        }
        return str.toString();
    },
    
    type: 'getMetricInstances'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-24 09:08:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>533f944583710210ae8dc4a6feaad375</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getMetricInstances</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_533f944583710210ae8dc4a6feaad375</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-24 09:43:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_3ce8b5f683ca4210ae8dc4a6feaad3a3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Diff Between Two Dates</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gdt1=new GlideDateTime(current.sys_created_on);
var gdt2=new GlideDateTime(current.sys_updated_on);

var duration=GlideDateTime.subtract(gdt1,gdt2);

gs.addInfoMessage(duration.getDisplayValue());

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-12 12:27:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3ce8b5f683ca4210ae8dc4a6feaad3a3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Diff Between Two Dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3ce8b5f683ca4210ae8dc4a6feaad3a3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-20 16:59:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3ce8b5f683ca4210ae8dc4a6feaad3a3"/></record_update>

	answer = false;
}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-14 10:01:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>0527cdceb7522010eeafbc16de11a970</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incident.knowledge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Incident Management Best Practice - Kingston" source="com.snc.best_practice.incident.kingston">d2b279128d34021087de63ac7f1f0061</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_0527cdceb7522010eeafbc16de11a970</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-09 19:54:44</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_producer_3a25637b47701100ba13a5554ee490a0
sys_update_xml.payload:
restrictedtruefalseon_desktopfalsefalse95fc11615f1211001c9b2572f2b477c60523da512c611228900811a37c97c20141970-01-03 00:00:00Service category requests enable creation and publishing of services for:

  • Inquiry
  • Request / Fullfill (ask for something, receive it)
  • Purchase items on behalf of the organization

By filling out this request, you or your designate will be the manager of the service category. You can assign editors or delegate / give manager authority to anyone in your department.

Once this request is approved, you will be notified via email and sent a link to begin creating your services. You will also be sent a link to the request table associated with the service requests.
